caseName: Creech v. Navient

recap_documents.description: OPINION AND ORDER: Plaintiff Thomas Creech's Motion for Summary Judgment  17   is DENIED. Defendant Navient's Cross-Motion for Summary Judgment  21  is GRANTED. The Clerk shall ENTER SUMMARY JUDGMENT in favor of defendant Navient and against plaintiff Thomas Creech, and thereby CLOSE this case.   Signed by Judge Philip P Simon on 2/23/2022.  (Copy mailed to pro se party certified mail #70191120000191197319). (nhc)
